unnormalised: Boss, I saw the Q3 report. Gross profit is up by 15%, which is great! But operating expenses also shot up by ₹2.5 lakhs. Need to check where that extra 2,50,000 INR went. Maybe the marketing team splurged? Also, EPS is at ₹12.50 - should be ₹13 at least, right?
normalised: Boss, I saw the Q three report. Gross profit is up by fifteen percent, which is great! But operating expenses also shot up by rupee two point five lakhs. Need to check where that extra two lakh fifty thousand Indian Rupee went. Maybe the marketing team splurged? Also, E-P-S is at rupee twelve point five zero - should be rupee thirteen at least, right?
